title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-228)
description: On April 23, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 17.11.1, 17.10.5 and 17.9.7
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 17.11.1, 17.10.5 and 17.9.7
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
